description:
Hit the trails in a technical mountain bike jersey. Quick-drying fabric breathes well and wicks away moisture to keep you cool while you're climbing. Raglan sleeves let groms move freely and won't chafe under pack straps.

  • Made of breathable polyester that is moisture-wicking to keep you cool and dry
  • Raglan sleeves give freedom of movement
  • Drop-back hem has you covered
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harmful UV
name: Sombrio Grom's Alder Jersey - Girls' - Youths
